content: bor beginning of round co cast on k knit kfb knit in front and back of stitch increase k2tog knit two stitches together p purl pm place marker round s rounds sm slip marker sts stitches ssk slip 1 st slip the next then put left needle back into the slipped sts and knit them together sweaters shown both versions are size 4 green version sunday morning dk in fresh sheets held with halo in cathedrale shown on a 34 bust pink version sunday morning dk ecru in romcom held with halo in glow-getter for this version note that the body is knit 1 longer and sleeves are knit 3 longer than specified in pattern shown on a 38 bust © sonder yarn co 2022 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only
